home.div.html: If you find any bugs, you can report them to our new Issue tracker! You can also suggest new features / changes!
If you join the Discord server, you can get a emoji for your Minecraft Profile. Make sure you have a LivzMC account and your Minecraft Profile is linked.

home.faq.q: Q: What information is being saved regarding Minecraft accounts?
home.faq.a: A: Only things that are saved are: Username, Username History, Skins, Mojang / OptiFine Capes. Really other than that, there is nothing else being stored.

home.faq.q: Q: Can My Username History be Hidden?
home.faq.a: A: Yes. Since LivzMC Archives the name history of accounts, if Mojang deletes your name history. Contact us and we are willing to hide it.

home.faq.q: Q: Can I hide my skin history and Cape history?
home.faq.a: A: Log in and claim your Minecraft account, then you can hide skins / capes.

home.faq.q: Q: How are OptiFine banner capes cached?
home.faq.a: A: They are cached the same way as skins and Mojang capes are! I have a queue of OptiFine Capes and I manaully edit them after a certain amount of time.

home.faq.q: Q: Can I claim my Minecraft Account?
home.faq.a: A: Yes! You can claim accounts by making a LivzMC Account here!

home.faq.q: Q: Why aren't LabyMod or MinecraftCapes not caching?
home.faq.a: A: You have to be logged in. If you are logged in and you are still having any issue, please contact me.
